name: Mystery Solitaire. Cthulhu Mythos 2
description:
Feel the cold breath of Cthulhu! Explore the worlds of Lovecraft, collect all the special cards!

200 game levels in the solitaire genre of three tops. Collect cards in sequence to get to the special cards that will help you advance further.

- Solitaire card game - collect a chain of cards!
- Exciting levels that won't let you get bored!
- Pick cards faster, thanks to the joker - increase the combo multiplier,
That gives you more coins!
- Original themed decks and 9 card shirt styles!
